name: Horde shooter
tagline: Basis for shooter games with Unity3D
body:
# Unity shooter 

## Introduction
Basis for shooter games with Unity3D

## Features
For now, the player can pick up different weapons (pistol, smg, shotgun, machine gun) which use ammunition available in limited quantity.
The enemies walk straight towards the player and attack them when in range.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
